DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Patients schedule gastroendoscopy examination Aged 18 80 year old Exclusion criterion : Antibiotic , probiotic prebiotic usage within 2months Esophageal , gastric duodenal cancer malignancy History upper GI tract surgery Coagulopathy bleeding disorder Allergy fluorescein sodium Pregnant breastfeeding ( female ) Impaired renal function
